channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump hits H-1B visas with $100,000 fee, targeting the program that launched Elon Musk and Instagram
item.description: President Trump signed a proclamation Friday requiring employers to pay a hefty $100,000 fee for new H-1B visa applications—an enormous jump from the ...

item.title: Google isn’t kidding around about cost cutting, even slashing its FT subscription
item.description: These cuts may save Google mere thousands; they also come as Google faces increasingly strained relationships with news publishers.

item.title: Donald Trump Is Saying There’s a TikTok Deal. China Isn’t
item.description: Donald Trump claimed victory on a deal that would put TikTok in the hands of his allies after a call with Xi Jinping. But details on the agreement—and...

item.title: YouTube Thinks AI Is Its Next Big Bang
item.description: On its 20th anniversary, YouTube is venturing into an era of AI-generated video, and may never be the same.

item.title: Cracking product-market fit: Lessons from founders and investors at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Rajat Bhageria (Chef Robotics), Ann Bordetsky (NEA), and Murali Joshi (ICONIQ) share actionable strategies for finding product-market fit at TechCrunc...

item.title: RFK Jr.’s Vaccine Panel Votes Down Its Own Proposal to Require Prescriptions for Covid-19 Shots
item.description: In a chaotic meeting, ACIP voted not to recommend a prescription requirement for Covid-19 vaccines. Some panelists seemed unaware of the point of the ...

item.title: Why California’s SB 53 might provide a meaningful check on big AI companies
item.description: Equity debates California's new AI safety bill and why it has a better shot at becoming law.

item.title: 10 Best Smartwatches (2025): Apple, Wear OS, Hybrid & Kids’ Watches
item.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.

item.title: Nvidia eyes $500M investment into self-driving tech startup Wayve
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang took his first ride in a Wayve-equipped self-driving car through Central London.

item.title: The 9 Best Grills of 2025
item.description: We grilled, smoked, seared, cleaned, and repeated to find the best option for every home.
